tooltip: Select Queen Bagu as your hero of choice.

heroSelectionDescriptionElements.tooltipText: Queen Baga focuses on improving Egg laying.
Allows you to summon Queen Baga, a support Hero that can spawn new units.
Large Gohma Creature that can generate Webbing and reduce the accuracy of enemy ranged attacks.
Gohma Eggs have twice as much HP.
Increases the potency of Gohma Webbing generated by Hive Cores and Hive Nodes.
